data.title: Getting To It Mandatory
data.meta_description: Have you heard Lloyd Banks's new track Getting To It Mandatory? It dropped on Sunday, April 10th, 2011.
data.text:
Stream Getting To It Mandatory, the newest drop from Lloyd Banks. The cut was released on Sunday, April 10th, 2011. Things are looking better for Lloyd Banks with each new release, which Getting To It Mandatory has proven yet again. It's worthy addition to the impressive body of work Lloyd Banks has been developing over the years. We're looking forward to hearing what's next.

Quotable Lyrics

"Ammo in the car still, diamonds out the window

Giant, make a regular car look like a limo

I'm hood, so everything ain't all good

Caught in the middle I should

Hold down my city how could

You fuck around with me? Why would

You seek attention? I'm like a lion out the fence when

I'm faced with tension, the audience is as suspensing"
